attributes.action: Increase funding to research treatment and medication for Long Covid sufferers
attributes.additional_details: Many people are suffering symptoms long after first testing positive for Covid, and symptoms can be debilitating, but this has not resulted in appropriate funding to research treatments and medication for this illness. More needs to be done by the Government.
attributes.background: We believe existing provision is not enough for Long Covid sufferers. The Government needs to provide further funding to research treatment and medication for this condition.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
